title: Executive Order 8765-Authorizing the Appointment of Alexander M. Knauss to the Position of Junior Historical Aide at the Vanderbilt Mansion National Historic Site, National Park Service, Department of the Interior, Without Regard to the Civil Service Rules
content: By virtue of the authority vested in me by the provisions of paragraph Eighth of subdivision SECOND of section 2 of the Civil Service Act (22 Stat. 403, 404), it is hereby ordered that Alexander M. Knauss may be appointed to the position of Junior Historical Aide at the Vanderbilt Mansion National Historic Site, National Park Service, Department of the Interior, without compliance with the requirements of the Civil Service Rules.
citation: Franklin D. Roosevelt, Executive Order 8765-Authorizing the Appointment of Alexander M. Knauss to the Position of Junior Historical Aide at the Vanderbilt Mansion National Historic Site, National Park Service, Department of the Interior, Without Regard to the Civil Service Rules Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/371672
